title: engineeringSeverity
extract: Severity is defined as the degree of impact a defect has on the development or operation of a component application being tested. Higher effect on the system functionality will lead to the assignment of higher severity to the bug. Quality Assurance engineer usually determines the severity level of defect. **Jul 13, 2017
extract_html: Severity is defined as the degree of impact a defect has on the development or operation of a component application being tested. Higher effect on the system functionality will lead to the assignment of higher severity to the bug. Quality Assurance engineer usually determines the severity level of defect. **Jul 13, 2017
